page.para: This is Rahul. He is call/ing his dog.
Rahul and his dog set off with the cows, to find grass.
Soon Rahul and his dog are hun/gry.
They leave the cows and go to look for food.
But now they can/not find the cows.
Rahul and his dog are ver/y sad.
Rahul and his dog go home.
Hoo/ray, the cows have come home. Rahul and his dog are hap/py.
